subject: Marketing
title: Body Image and Advertising
description: A quick win: understand Body Image and Advertising.

hook.text: After Fiji got television in 1995, eating disorders among teenage girls surged within three years.

buildup.text: Advertising creates idealized body standards that most people can never achieve.

discovery.text: Exposure to idealized images correlates directly with body dissatisfaction and mental health issues.

twist.text: Dove's Real Beauty campaign proved brands can profit by challenging unrealistic standards.

punchline.text: Advertising shapes culture. Shape it responsibly.
